modName: SAM and Moonlight Tales Werewolf Essentials merged
summary: Enables werewolf genitalia on MTE models
descriptionHtml:
[b]Information
[/b]My goal of this plugin was to enable werewolf genitalia for those who use both [i]Moonlight Tales - Werewolf Essentials[/i] by Brevi and [i]SAM[/i] by VectorPlexus. So when you pick your werewolf model and textures through the MCM menu, the schlong will use a matching texture which was included among the SAM archives. Even supports the Apex Werewolf model. And yes, now you can even be a d-girl werewolf (if you play as a male though).

[b]Required Mods
[/b]-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59463/?]Moonlight Tales - Werewolf Essentials
[/url]-[url=http://www.ladymoiraine.com/forum/index.php?topic=8263.0]SAM - Shape Atlas For Men
[/url]-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52147/?]Moonlight Tales Mighty Beasts Compatibility[/url] (meshes only)

[b]Recommended Mods
[/b]-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60804/?]HD Werewolves[/url]Â (Which I'm using in the screenshots)

[b]Known Issues[/b]
-If you change your werewolf skin while in werewolf form, the schlong might disappear. To fix this, bring up the console and type "player.setnpcweight x" (with x being a number between 0 and 100). Alternatively you may try to reload the savegame.
-If you untick the "Enable Schlongs" option in the MCM menu for SAM, the schlong won't automatically disappear. Probably just my experience.
-Right now the models doesn't support the Samuel/Samson scaling. (I don't want to fiddle too much with the meshes in NifSkope.)

Make sure you load the SAM plugins before MTE, and my modified plugin after.

Should you find more bugs or if you have any questions, do send me a PM. For now, I will disable comments.

I don't plan to make this plugin compatible with Automatic Variants, too complicated for me to work on

-

-Credits and thanks goes to Brevi, VectorPlexus and Alkaiser for their original plugins which made mine possible. :)

I'd be more than happy if users submitted screenshots related to my plugin ^.^
author: Brevi VectorPlexus Alkaiser T3alrose
